English: Why did you lock the Bunk door?

Chinese (simplified): @q0 \n@d1 我一定会想念你的艺术...

English: The fleet... How long did you know about it ?!
( Just wait and look at him )
@q0 @d1 Got back to your senses? @w1 Good.\nWe need to move.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1 恢复理智了？@w1 很好。\n我们得走了。

English: All of them. But each one differently.
Chinese (simplified): 所有的。但每一个都不一样。

English: @q0 @d1\n-<color=#ffff00> Armor locker</color> is to your left.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1\n-<color=#ffff00> 装甲柜</color> 在你的左边。

English: Found the leak. - A block is not airtight.
Chinese (simplified): 发现了泄漏。 - 一个方块不是密封的。

English: I found the leak. - And, your hidden stash.
Chinese (simplified): 我发现了泄漏。 - 还有，你隐藏的藏匿处。

English: You are frustrated again. You are exploding things.
Chinese (simplified): 你又沮丧了。你在炸东西。

English: I do have a name, you know...?
It's open to space...? No wonder it does not grow!
Chinese (simplified): 它对太空...？？难怪它不生长！
@q0 @d1\n这是按努力程度调整的薪水。

English: @q0 @d1\nYou will see for yourself. @w1\nIt is outside, waiting in a box.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1\n你自己会看到的。@w1\n它在外面，在一个盒子里等着。

English: ... How did you find the fleet?
@q0 @d1\n\n... Offers on Slave market. @w1 Exotics black market. @w1 Morgues. @w1 Zoos...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1\n\n... 奴隶市场上的报价。@w1 异国情调的黑市。@w1 太平间。@w1 动物园...

English: This ship has no holding cells.
@q0 @d1\nYou don't trust me, I don't trust anyone, - @w1 - We have to LEAVE, NOW.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1\n你不相信我，我也不信任任何人， - @w1 - 我们必须现在就离开。
[ 退出 & 主 飞行员座位解锁 ]

English: @q0 @d1 But you are back. And your head-fur has ever been growing! - ... You do remember all this, yes...?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1 但是你回来了。你的头部毛发一直在生长！ - ... 你确实记得这一切，对吧...？

English: @q0 @d1 Great. @w1 Then lets do this here. We deliver our cargo. Then we all can stop and relax at a nice beach, or something...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1 太好了。@w1 那么让我们在这里完成 。 我们交付我们的货物。然后我们都可以停下来，在美丽的海滩上放松一下，或者类似的事情...

English: @q0 @d1\n- Your human fleet. \n@w1 I think we found it. - Nearby.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1\n- 你的人类 舰队。\n@w1 我想我们找到了。- 在附近。
'敲击' ? - 看起来更像是'闭合性骨折' ...

English: 'Spike lemon' ... I don't feel so well ...
Chinese (simplified): '尖刺柠檬' ... 我感觉不太舒服...

English: @q0 @d1\n- Now please help Galleon, before he triggers our cargo ... !
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1\n- 现在请 帮助加利恩，在他触发我们的货物之前... !

English: ... There is a problem with that, right?
@q0 @d1 \n- talk to you later. - @w1 - Oh, and if you warp back, just try to avoid the local Zirax !\nGalleon, if you would be so kind - ... [ Explosions ]
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1 \n- 待会再聊。 - @w1 - 哦，如果你翘曲回来，尽量避开当地的兹瑞克斯！\n加利恩，如果你愿意的话 - ... [ 爆炸声 ]
\n@q0 @d1 @w1 ...\n@w1 '超时已到。连接失败，在1500次重试后 - 停止。'
@d1 \n'无法重新建立连接。网络故障。 - 停止。'

English: @w1\nI'll just ... @w1 find a safe spot, while you <color=#ffffff>fly this thing.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @w1\n我就... @w1 找个安全的地方，而你<color=#ffffff>驾驶这个东西。</color>

English: @d1 \n'Cannot access network.\nConnection has been manually severed. '
Chinese (simplified): @d1 \n'无法访问网络。\n连接已被手动切断。'

English: Message date... - This is Rescue. Hearing you loud and clear. - Understood. - Please keep calm. You are safe now. Message date... - We have an urgent request from MissionOps. - Repeat, this is an A-1 case. Please see file. [Attachment missing] Message date... - Confirmed, network is offline. Well done. - Pickup will take a bit longer, until the Code sappers are free. Message date... - We apologize for not calling back sooner. The whole star cluster has been listed for quarantine. - Yes. Just leave this mess as it is. - And, the AI Dev unit wants to have a talk. - No. Just to know, what they might be getting into. Message date... - This is it - - we organized a local transport. Called 'Taurus'. Collection point is at northern Nest base. Get there asap. Blueprint for a cheap Hover Vessel is at the end of this message. Spawn it with the Factory. [Attachment missing] - Yes. But really well paid ones. - Don't worry. Message date... - A Zirax Battlecuiser is headed for in-system. The whole set, together with a Dronebase Teleporter Lens. What is the status of your Hover Vessel? (( End of Messages ))
Chinese (simplified): 消息日期... - 这里是救援。我听得很清楚。 - 明白了。- 请保持冷静。你现在安全了。 消息日期... - 我们有一个来自任务操作的紧急请求。 - 重复，这是一个A-1级别的案件。 请查看文件。[附件丢失] 消息日期... - 确认，网络已离线。做得好。 - 接应会需要更长时间，直到代码工兵有空。 消息日期... - 我们为没有早点回电道歉。整个星团已被列为检疫区。 - 是的。就让它这样吧。- 另外，人工智能开发单位想和你谈谈。 - 不。只是想知道，他们可能会遇到什么。 消息日期... - 就是这个 - - 我们组织了一次当地运输。名为'Taurus'。 集合点在北部巢穴基地。尽快到达那里。 这条消息的末尾有一个便宜的悬浮飞船的蓝图。用工厂生成它。[附件丢失] - 是的。但报酬非常丰厚。- 别担心。 消息日期... - 一艘兹瑞克斯战斗巡洋舰正驶向系统内。整套设备，连同一个无人机基地传送装置镜头。 你的悬浮飞船状态如何？ (( 消息结束 ))

English:
@d1 
Message date...

- A Zirax Battlecruiser is headed for in-system. The whole set, together with a Dronebase Teleporter Lens.

What is the status of your Hover Vessel?
Chinese (simplified):
@d1 
消息日期...

- 一艘兹瑞克斯战列巡洋舰正朝系统内前进。整个编队，连同一个无人机基地传送装置镜头。

你的悬浮飞船状态如何？

English: @q0 @d1 You are back. @w1 Good.\nWe need to move.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 @d1 你回来了。@w1 很好。\n我们需要移动。

English: Why did you lock the Bunk door?
Can't be done much about it. <color=#ffffff>[Skip all]</color>
Chinese (simplified): 对此无能为力。<color=#ffffff>[跳过全部]</color>

English: So, why did you lock the bunk door?
Chinese (simplified): 那么，你为什么要锁住舱门？

English: ... How did you find the fleet?
OK, got it! [ Close note & end of invulnerability ]
Chinese (simplified): 好的，明白了！ [ 关闭笔记 & 无敌状态结束 ]
您目前是无敌的。 您刚刚死亡，并且掉落了一部分装备在一个背包中。- 它将在20分钟内消失。 - 当靠近敌人时，使用您的工具无人机 [ F5 ] 来取回它。 - 您可以在游戏的难度设置中调整掉落物品的数量。

English: OK, got it! [ Close note & end of invulnerability ]
Chinese (simplified): 好的，明白了！ [ 关闭笔记 & 无敌状态结束 ]
